fields.name: AppResourceId
fields.description: The resource Id of the Azure Spring Apps app, required unless route defines `uri`.

fields.name: Filters
fields.description: To modify the request before sending it to the target endpoint, or the received response in app level.

fields.name: Predicates
fields.description: A number of conditions to evaluate a route for each request in app level. Each predicate may be evaluated against request headers and parameter values. All of the predicates associated with a route must evaluate to true for the route to be matched to the request.

fields.name: Protocol
fields.description: Protocol of routed Azure Spring Apps applications.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: State of the Spring Cloud Gateway route config.

fields.name: Routes
fields.description: Array of API routes, each route contains properties such as `title`, `uri`, `ssoEnabled`, `predicates`, `filters`.

fields.name: SsoEnabled
fields.description: Enable Single Sign-On in app level.
